title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter - the ultimate solution to all your vehicle battery woes! With its impressive 4000A peak current and a whopping 27800mAh battery capacity, this jump starter is a powerhouse that can start any gas engine and even up to 10L diesel engines. 

Equipped with a 12V Auto Jump Box, this battery booster power pack is designed to provide reliable and efficient performance whenever you need it. The built-in LED light ensures visibility in low-light situations, making it perfect for emergencies or late-night repairs. 

But that's not all - this jump starter also features USB Quick Charge 3.0 technology, allowing you to charge your devices faster than ever before. The USB ports, including a Type-C input/output, provide versatile charging options for your smartphones, tablets, and other gadgets. 

Safety is a top priority with the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter. It comes with an intelligent protection system that guards against short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection, ensuring worry-free usage every time. 

Compact and portable, this jump starter is your reliable companion on the road. Its rugged design and metal clamps ensure durability and long-lasting performance. 

With a charging speed that is 75% faster than ordinary power banks, you won't have to wait long to get back on the road. The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is suitable for a wide range of vehicles, including cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles. 

To make your purchase even more convenient, the package includes essential accessories such as Portable Battery Starter, Jumper Cables, USB-C Cable, Cigarette Lighter Converter, Carry Case, and User Manual. 

We value our customers, which is why our 24-hour online after-sales team is always ready to assist you with any queries or concerns. 

Don't let a dead battery leave you stranded - trust the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter to get you back on the road in no time. Order yours today and experience the power and convenience of this incredible device!

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate solution for all your emergency power needs! With a powerful 4000A peak current and a massive 27800mAh battery capacity, this jump starter is capable of jump-starting all gas engines and up to 10L diesel engines. 

Equipped with a 12V Auto Jump Box and an LED light, this jump starter is a versatile and essential tool for every car owner. The USB Quick Charge 3.0 feature ensures rapid charging for your devices, providing convenience on the go. 

Safety is our top priority, which is why our jump starter comes with an intelligent protection system that safeguards against short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connections. You can rely on AVAPOW to keep you and your vehicle safe. 

With its portable design, you can take this jump starter anywhere you go. It's perfect for cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and even snowmobiles. The rugged design and metal clamps ensure durability and reliability in any situation. 

The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter also includes an 88Wh portable battery charger, giving you even more power when you need it. Plus, with its 75% faster charging speed compared to ordinary power banks, you'll be back on the road in no time. 

In the package, you'll find everything you need, including the Portable Battery Starter, Jumper Cables, USB-C Cable, Cigarette Lighter Converter, Carry Case, and User Manual. We also offer 24-hour online after-sales support, so you can always reach out to our team for assistance. 

Don't get stranded with a dead battery. Invest in the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter and enjoy peace of mind on the road. Get yours today and experience the power and reliability that AVAPOW brings to your journey.

Equipped with a 12V Auto Jump Box and an LED light, this battery booster power pack is a must-have for every driver. The LED light features multiple modes, including flashlight, SOS, and strobe, providing you with the necessary visibility in any situation.
